name: Drunk Hill
description:
Mink wants to drink!

Help Mink reach his favorite bar by ascending a mountain! Throughout Mink's trip he will stumble upon more bars and get even drunker ;) 

Mink is a little... unstable, so do look out for dangerous obstacles, we don't want Mink to fall of a cliff!

![ezgif.com-gif-maker.gif](///raw/88b/c2/z/45c18.gif)

Features

- Play with keyboard or controller to control Mink.

- Fight against Mink's instability.

- Enjoy the soundtrack and 4 levels!

The team

For this jam, we had 3 developers!

- BasicMilky

- Traxx186

- Parasite186

Aroy helped us create art for the player, bushes, and ground textures.

We'd like to thank Joseluis Jimenez for creating an awesome soundtrack for us!
